metadata.title: CVE-2022-43071 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow in the Catalog::readPageLabelTree2(Object*) function ofXPDF v4.04 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
